key_takeaways: Solution: Enforce 'no asshole rule' and encourage helpful responses instead of snarky redirects (Difficulty: intermediate)
Solution: Strict no-solicitation rules with active enforcement (Difficulty: intermediate)
Growth Tactic: Solve your own problem publicly and invite others with same problem (Channel: community)
Strategy: Build pure community first, monetize later through complementary products
Strategy: Diversified content and publishing model around core community

startup_ideas.business_model: Community first, then complementary products and content
startup_ideas.validation: Look for industries where existing communities prioritize selling over helping
